TrcCommonLib.trclib

Class TrcSimpleDriveBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • TrcCommonLib.trclib.TrcDriveBase
      • TrcCommonLib.trclib.TrcSimpleDriveBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrcExclusiveSubsystem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TrcMecanumDriveBase, TrcSwerveDriveBase

    public class TrcSimpleDriveBase
extends TrcDriveBase
    This class implements a platform independent simple drive base. The SimpleDriveBase class implements a drive train that may consist of 2 to 6 motors. It supports tank drive, curve drive and arcade drive with motor stalled detection and inverted drive mode. It also supports gyro assisted drive to keep robot driving straight.

                          TrcMotorController rightBackMotor,
                          TrcGyro gyro)
        Constructor: Create an instance of a 6-wheel drive base.
        Parameters:
        leftFrontMotor - specifies the left front motor of the drive base.
        leftCenterMotor - specifies the left center motor of a 6-wheel drive base.
        leftBackMotor - specifies the left back motor of the drive base.
        rightFrontMotor - specifies the right front motor of the drive base.
        rightCenterMotor - specifies the right center motor of a 6-wheel drive base.
        rightBackMotor - specifies the right back motor of the drive base.
        gyro - specifies the gyro. If none, it can be set to null.

      • isMotorStalled

        public boolean isMotorStalled(TrcSimpleDriveBase.MotorType motorType,
                              double stallTime)
        This method checks if the specified motor has stalled.
        Parameters:
        motorType - specifies the motor in the drive train.
        stallTime - specifies the stall time in seconds to be considered stalled.
        Returns:
        true if the motor is stalled, false otherwise.

      • tankDrive

        public void tankDrive(java.lang.String owner,
                      double leftPower,
                      double rightPower,
                      boolean inverted)
        This method implements tank drive where leftPower controls the left motors and right power controls the right motors.
        Specified by:
        tankDrive in class TrcDriveBase
        Parameters:
        owner - specifies the ID string of the caller for checking ownership, can be null if caller is not ownership aware.
        leftPower - specifies left power value.
        rightPower - specifies right power value.
        inverted - specifies true to invert control (i.e. robot front becomes robot back).
